submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)

        diff = [0] * (k+2)
        for i in range(n//2):
            p1 = abs(nums[i]-nums[n-1-i])
            p2 = max( max(nums[i],nums[n-1-i]), k-min(nums[i],nums[n-1-i]))
            diff[0] += 1
            diff[p1] -= 1
            diff[p1+1] += 1
            diff[p2+1] += 1
            diff[k+1] -= 2

        ans = c = diff[0]
        for i in range(1,k+1):
            c += diff[i]
            ans = min(ans, c)
        return ans
